question: Padma Shri Prof Predhiman Krishan Kaw who has died recently was known as the father of __________.
explanation: Padma Shri Prof Predhiman Krishan Kaw was the father of India's nuclear fusion reactor research programme. Kaw was the first chairman of the ITER Council Science and Technology Advisory Committee and led the committee's deliberations from 2007 to 2009.
